problem_text_cn: 如图,李红同学为了在新年晚会上表演节目,她利用半径为40的扇形纸片制作一个圆锥形纸帽(接缝处不重叠),如果圆锥底面半径为10,那么这个圆锥的侧面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the picture, in order to perform at the New Year's party, Li Hong uses a sector-shaped paper with a radius of N_0 to make a cone-shaped paper cap (the joints do not overlap). If the radius of the bottom of the cone is N_1, then the lateral area of ​​the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:圆锥侧面积公式为:s侧面积=πrR=π×10×40=400π．故选:D．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了圆锥的侧面积公式求法,注意公式的灵活应用．
